sn35.139:4.2: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn35.139:4.4: Sights aren’t yours: give them up.
sn35.139:4.6: Giving them up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn35.139:4.11: phenomena aren’t yours: give them up.
sn35.139:4.13: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn35.139:4.14: Suppose a person was to carry off the grass, sticks, branches, and leaves in this Jeta’s Grove …
sn35.139:4.15: In the same way, sights aren’t yours: give them up.
sn35.139:4.17: Giving them up will be for your welfare and happiness. …”
